types:type.name: emp-op
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type emp_op = Array<{| empID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, empName: String, empStatus: String, empAddress: String, empPhone: String, diagnosisCheck: String, criminalCheck: String|}> {"example": "[{\"empID\":100,\"empName\":\"test1\",\"empStatus\":\"A\",\"empAddress\":\"India\",\"empPhone\":\"878990\",\"diagnosisCheck\":\"fail\",\"criminalCheck\":\"Pass\"}]"}
